mapper.select: SELECT /* com.qs.www.schedule.model.dao.ScheduleDAO#selectAllWorkType() */ A.WORK_CODE , A.WORK_NAME , A.BREAK_START_TIME , A.BREAK_END_TIME , A.MINIMAL_WORK_HOUR , A.CHECK_IN_TIME , A.CHECK_OUT_TIME FROM TBL_STANDARD_WORK A WHERE A.ACTIVE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#selectOneReportDetail()*/ TBL_APPROVER_PER_REPORT A SET A.APPROVER_TYPE = '대기' WHERE A.REPORT_NO = #{ reportNo } AND A.PRIORITY = 1
mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_OVERTIME_LOG_NO , A.OVERTIME_REPORT_NO , A.MEMBER_NO , A.OVERTIME_START_DAY , A.OVERTIME_START_TIME , A.OVERTIME_END_DAY , A.OVERTIME_END_TIME , A.OVERTIME_DURING , A.TRANS_BILL FROM TBL_MEMBER_OVERTIME_LOG A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo } AND A.OVERTIME_START_DAY BETWEEN #{ weekStartDate } AND #{ weekEndDate }

SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.NAME , A.ROLE_CODE , C.ROLE_NAME , A.DEPT_CODE , D.DEPT_NAME , A.JOB_CODE , E.JOB_NAME , A.APP_WORK_TYPE , A.WORK_CODE
, B.WORK_NAME , B.CHECK_IN_TIME , B.CHECK_OUT_TIME
, F.* , G.*
FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_ROLE C ON (A.ROLE_CODE = C.ROLE_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D ON (A.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_JOB E ON (A.JOB_CODE = E.JOB_CODE)
LEFT JOIN TBL_STANDARD_WORK B ON (A.WORK_CODE = B.WORK_CODE)
LEFT JOIN TBL_CUSTOM_WORK F ON (A.WORK_CODE = F.WORK_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_CUSTOM_WORKTIME G ON (F.WORK_NO = G.WORK_NO)
WHERE A.ENT_YN = 'N' AND A.DEPT_CODE = #{ myDeptCode }

SELECT B.HOLIDAY_LOG_NO , B.MEMBER_NO , B.LOG_NOTE , B.HOLIDAY_CODE , C.* FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER_HOLIDAY_LOG B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_HOLIDAY_USE_INFO C ON (B.HOLIDAY_LOG_NO = C.HOLIDAY_LOG_NO) WHERE A.ENT_YN = 'N' AND A.DEPT_CODE = #{ myDeptCode } AND B.LOG_TYPE = '사용' AND #{ currentDate } between C.HOLIDAY_START_DAY AND C.HOLIDAY_END_DAY
SELECT /* com.qs.www.schedule.model.dao.ScheduleDAO#selectCustomWorkNum() */ LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'SEQ_CUSTOM_WORK'
